scripts.name: Ammo timer
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Display a timer under map health/ammo packs

scripts.name: Visible-only ESP
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: ESP for displaying enemy health only when they are visible. Also comes with medic mode where you can see teammate health through walls

scripts.name: Focus fire indicator
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Draws chams on a player who is being shot by more than one player

scripts.name: Hider detector
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Detects hiding players and draws a box on them if they haven't moved for a certain amount of time

scripts.name: Medic pylon
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Draws a red pylon that extends from behind objects so you will always find medic

scripts.name: Trails
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Display trails through walls for players to guide players to last known spots

scripts.name: Uber counter
scripts.author: compuserscripts
scripts.description: Advanced uber counter for competitive play
